src:
Ini Alasan di Balik Sindiran Guardiola Kepada Sadio Mane
04 Nov 2019, 16:31 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Eks gelandang Timnas Inggris Jamie Redknapp mengklaim Josep Guardiola sengaja menyindir Sadio Mane karena ia takut dengan ancaman yang bisa dihadirkan pemain Liverpool tersebut pada Manchester City.
Sadio Mane tampil heroik saat Liverpool bersua dengan Aston Villa akhir pekan kemarin. Ia jadi aktor kemenangan 1-2 The Reds atas sang lawan di Villa Park, Sabtu (02/11/2019).
Ia menjadi kreator gol pertama Liverpool. Dengan kaki kirinya ia memberikan umpan yang bisa dituntaskan dengan sundulan oleh Andrew Robertson.
Mane kemudian mencetak gol kedua Liverpool. Ia menyundul bola hasil tendangan sudut Trent Alexander-Arnold.
text:
This Is The Reason Behind Guardiola's Satire To Sadio Mane
Nov 04 2019, 16:31 by Bola.net
Former England national team midfielder Jamie Redknapp claims Josep Guardiola deliberately insinuated Sadio Mane because he was afraid of the threat that the Liverpool player could present to Manchester City.
Sadio Mane appeared heroically when Liverpool met with Aston Villa last weekend. He became the actor of the Reds 1-2 victory over his opponent at Villa Park, Saturday (02/11/2019).
He became the creator of Liverpool's first goal. With his left foot he gives a bait that can be completed with a header by Andrew Robertson.
Mane then scored Liverpool's second goal. He headed the Trent Alexander-Arnold corner kick.
